title: 0x01 位运算
content: 0x01 位运算 # a^b # #include <stdio.h> typedef long long LL; LL power(LL a, LL b, LL p) { LL ans = 1ll % p; for (; b; b >>= 1) { if (b & 1) ans = ans * a % p; a = a * a % p; } return ans; } int main() { LL a, b, p; scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &a, &b, &p); printf("%lld\n", power(a, b, p)); return 0; }
